metadata.name: Apo prucalopride 1 mg 1 Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in parkinson s disease

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Methylphenidate is combined with Etilevodopa
The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Dexmethylphenidate is combined with Etilevodopa
The therapeutic efficacy of Etilevodopa can be decreased when used in combination with Metoclopramide
The therapeutic efficacy of Etilevodopa can be decreased when used in combination with Ziprasidone
The therapeutic efficacy of Etilevodopa can be decreased when used in combination with Olanzapine
